item.title: 投资者怀疑 Hard Rock 拟议收购的有效性，星牌股价暴跌
item.description: 澳大利亚星际娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）的股价在飙升 20% 一天后，于周二大幅下跌，原因是投资者对该公司提出的收购要约表示困惑，这家资金短缺的赌场运营商称，该要约来自包括硬石酒店及度假村（太平洋）在内的一个财团。【原文：Shares of Australia's Star Entertainment plunged on Tuesday, a day after soaring 20%, as investors expressed their confusion over a proposed takeover offer that the cash-strapped casino operator said came from a consortium including Hard Rock Hotels & Resorts (Pacific).】

item.title: 油价因担心美国高利率抑制需求而下跌
item.description: 周二亚市早盘，油价下跌，投资者预计美国通胀和利率的长期走高将抑制消费和工业需求。【原文：Oil prices fell in early Asian trade on Tuesday, with investors anticipating higher-for-longer U.S. inflation and interest rates will depress consumer and industrial demand.】

item.title: 美元持稳；以太币推动加密货币反弹
item.description: 美元周二表现坚挺，而日元则在156关口的较弱一侧挣扎，不过，由于投资者普遍坚持他们对美联储今年降息的预期时间和幅度的看法，交易大多在区间内进行。【原文：The dollar was firm on Tuesday while the yen struggled on the weaker side of the 156 level, though trade was mostly rangebound as investors generally stuck to their views of the expected timing and extent of Federal Reserve rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 在人工智能蓬勃发展之际，三星电子挑选资深高管应对 "芯片危机
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）更换了其半导体部门的主管，以帮助该集团克服 "芯片危机"，分析师称，在人工智能芯片市场蓬勃发展的背景下，这家全球最大的存储芯片制造商落后于同行。【原文：Samsung Electronics has replaced the chief of its semiconductor division to help the group overcome a "chip crisis", amid a booming market for AI chips where analyst say the world's biggest memory chipmaker lags peers.】

item.title: 独家报道：美国顶级天然气生产商切萨皮克能源公司裁员
item.description: 美国顶级天然气生产商切萨皮克能源公司（Chesapeake Energy）周一表示，在去年完成石油资产剥离后，该公司本周开始裁员。【原文：Chesapeake Energy , a top U.S. natural gas producer, began laying off employees this week after completing the divestiture of its oil assets last year, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 普华永道称，人工智能密集型行业生产力激增

item.title: 澳大利亚电信公司将在年底前裁员 2800 人以简化运营
item.description: 澳大利亚电信公司 Telstra 周二表示，作为简化运营和提高生产率拟议措施的一部分，该公司将在今年年底前裁减多达 2800 个直接员工职位。【原文：Australian telecom firm Telstra said on Tuesday it would reduce up to 2,800 jobs from its direct workforce by the end of this year, as a part of its proposed measures to simplify operations and improve productivity.】

item.title: 美国诉讼挑战西南航空为西语裔学生提供的免费机票计划
item.description: 周一，一个由著名的反平权行动积极分子创立的团体起诉西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines），指控该公司一项已有二十年历史的为西语裔本科生和研究生提供免费往返机票的计划存在种族歧视。【原文：A group founded by a prominent anti-affirmative action activist on Monday sued Southwest Airlines , alleging that a two-decade-old program that awards free round-trip flights to Hispanic undergraduate and graduate students is racially discriminatory.】

item.title: 美国监管机构将调查 VinFast 在加利福尼亚州造成四人死亡的车祸事件
item.description: 美国汽车安全调查人员周一表示，他们将调查今年 4 月在加利福尼亚州普莱森顿发生的 VinFast , VF 8 电动汽车撞车事故，事故造成一家四口死亡。【原文：U.S. auto safety investigators said on Monday they will investigate the April crash of a VinFast , VF 8 electric vehicle in Pleasanton, California, in which a family of four died.】

item.title: 早间竞价：亚洲股市迎来 2021 年以来最佳表现
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 比特币升至 70 206 美元
item.description: 北京时间周一20:03，比特币涨至70206美元，较上一交易日收盘价增加了3931美元。【原文：Bitcoin rose to $70,206 at 20:03 GMT on Monday, adding $3,931 to its previous close.】

item.title: 汽车制造商支持美国环保署汽车尾气排放新规的关键部分
item.description: 代表通用汽车、丰田汽车、大众汽车和几乎所有其他主要汽车制造商的贸易团体周一支持美国新规则的两个关键部分，即在 2032 年之前大幅减少汽车尾气排放。【原文：A trade group representing General Motors , Toyota Motor , Volkswagen and nearly all other major automakers on Monday backed two key portions of new U.S. rules to dramatically cut vehicle emissions through 2032.】

item.title: Truth Social 所有者第一季度亏损扩大
item.description: Trump Media and Technology Group 是社交媒体应用 Truth Social 的运营商，由于在完成与一家空头支票公司的合并之前产生了一些非现金支出，该公司第一季度的亏损扩大。【原文：Trump Media and Technology Group , the operator of the social media app Truth Social, saw a wider loss in the first quarter due to certain non-cash expenses it incurred prior to closing its merger with a blank-check company.】

item.title: Peloton 出售 2.75 亿美元可转换票据，为债务再融资
item.description: Peloton Interactive 公司周一表示，将出售 2.75 亿美元 2029 年到期的可转换票据，这家健身器材生产商希望在连续 13 个季度亏损后为债务再融资并恢复增长。【原文：Peloton Interactive said on Monday it will sell $275 million of convertible notes due 2029 as the fitness equipment maker looks to refinance its debt and return to growth after 13 straight quarters of losses.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克公司因善达克致癌风险面临举报人诉讼
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司被康涅狄格州的一家独立实验室起诉，该实验室指控葛兰素史克公司欺骗美国政府和纳税人，隐瞒了曾是胃灼热类畅销药的 "善达"（Zantac）的致癌风险。【原文：GSK has been sued by an independent Connecticut laboratory that accused the drugmaker of defrauding the U.S. government and taxpayers by concealing cancer risks in Zantac, once a blockbuster heartburn drug.】

item.title: 马拉松伙伴公司敦促马腾博士回购股票并详细说明削减开支的情况
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，投资公司 Marathon Partners Equity Management 正在加大对 Dr Martens 的压力，敦促这家英国靴子制造商详细说明削减开支的计划，并回购股票。【原文：Investment firm Marathon Partners Equity Management is turning up the heat on Dr Martens by urging the British boot maker to detail planned expense cuts and to buy back stock, people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: Palo Alto Networks 预计季度销售额高于预期
item.description: Palo Alto Networks 公司周一预测，第四季度的营业额将超过华尔街的预期，这表明客户正在转向这家网络安全公司，购买其集成软件安全工具。【原文：Palo Alto Networks forecast fourth-quarter billings above Wall Street estimates on Monday, a sign that clients are turning to the cybersecurity firm for its integrated software security tools.】

item.title: Zoom Video 上调全年收入预期
item.description: Zoom Video Communications 周一上调了全年营收预期，原因是企业继续采用混合工作模式，对其产品组合的需求强劲。【原文：Zoom Video Communications raised its full-year revenue forecast on Monday, helped by robust demand for its product portfolio as companies continue to adopt hybrid work models.】

item.title: 申请破产后，红龙虾公司调查 "无穷无尽的虾 "损失情况
item.description: 法庭文件显示，周日晚在佛罗里达州申请破产保护的 Red Lobster 正在调查其大股东 Thai Union 在连锁餐厅 "吃不完的虾 "促销活动中扮演的角色，该促销活动造成了 1100 万美元的损失。【原文：Red Lobster, which filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in Florida on Sunday night, is investigating the role its majority owner Thai Union played in the restaurant chain's "endless shrimp" promotion that caused $11 million in losses, court documents showed.】

item.title: 戴尔推出新款个人电脑和英伟达（Nvidia）服务器，进一步推动人工智能发展
item.description: 戴尔科技公司发布了一系列采用高通处理器的人工智能 PC，并表示将从 2024 年下半年开始推出支持英伟达最新芯片的新型服务器。【原文：Dell Technologies unveiled a range of AI-enabled PCs powered by Qualcomm processors and said a new server which supports Nvidia's latest chips will be available from the second half of 2024.】

item.title: 贝莱德举报人称其掩盖了搜索引擎发现中国投资的事实
item.description: 贝莱德被一名举报的前副总裁起诉，要求赔偿 2000 万美元。该副总裁称，资产管理公司在关闭了一个可以监控客户关于非法投资（包括在中国的非法投资）讨论的搜索引擎后，解雇了他。【原文：BlackRock was sued for $20 million by a whistleblowing former vice president who said the asset manager fired him after shutting down a search engine that could monitor client discussions about illegal investments, including in China.】

item.title: 巴尔要求折扣窗口准备就绪可打破 "成见
item.description: 美联储负责监管的副主席迈克尔-巴尔（Michael Barr）周一表示，美联储正在考虑制定新的规则，以打破从央行贴现窗口借款以满足短期现金需求的 "污名化"。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve is considering new rules to break the "stigma" around borrowing from the central bank's discount window to cover short-term cash needs, Fed vice chair for supervision Michael Barr said on Monday.】

item.title: CalPERS 将以诉讼为由投票反对所有 12 名埃克森董事
item.description: 加州公务员退休系统周一表示，将对埃克森公司的所有 12 名董事提名人投反对票，理由是该公司对激进投资者提起了诉讼。【原文：The California Public Employees' Retirement System said on Monday it will vote against all 12 director nominees at Exxon, citing the company's lawsuit against activist investors.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团股东 LGIM 支持分拆计划，必和必拓也参与其中
item.description: 英美资源集团股东Legal & General Investment Management（LGIM）周一表示，随着必和必拓集团（BHP Group）提出正式收购要约的最后期限临近，该公司支持上周宣布的分拆计划。【原文：Anglo American shareholder Legal & General Investment Management (LGIM) supports the break-up plan announced by the company last week, it said on Monday, as the deadline approaches for BHP Group to log a formal takeover offer.】

item.title: 摩根大通高管在博鳌银行家去世后强调员工健康和福祉
item.description: 摩根大通的高层管理人员周一在回答有关紧张工作条件的问题时强调了员工健康的重要性。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's top executives on Monday emphasized the importance of employee health in response to a question about intense working conditions.】

item.title: 美联储杰斐逊：判断通胀放缓是否 "长期持续 "为时尚早
item.description: 美联储副主席杰斐逊周一表示，近期一些关键物价上涨指标的消退令人鼓舞，但要知道通胀率是否已回到2%的可持续轨道还为时尚早。【原文：The recent ebbing in some key price increase indicators is encouraging but it is too soon to know whether inflation is back on a sustainable path back to 2%, Fed Vice Chair Jefferson said on Monday.】

item.title: 参议院主要民主党人呼吁联邦存款保险公司更换新领导层
item.description: 参议院银行委员会主席谢罗德-布朗（Sherrod Brown）周一呼吁为陷入困境的联邦存款保险公司寻找新的领导层，敦促总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）立即提名人选接替现任主席马丁-格伦伯格（Martin Gruenberg）。【原文：Senate Banking Committee Chairman Sherrod Brown called for new leadership at the troubled Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation Monday, urging President Joe Biden to immediately nominate someone to replace current Chairman Martin Gruenberg.】

item.title: 巴西央行计划年底提出加密货币监管提案
item.description: 巴西央行周一宣布，已决定将加密资产和虚拟资产服务提供商的监管过程分为几个阶段，预计将在今年年底前提出监管建议。【原文：Brazil's central bank announced on Monday that it has decided to divide the process of regulating crypto-assets and virtual asset service providers into phases, with regulatory proposals expected by the end of this year.】

item.title: 参议院报告：宝马向美国进口了 8,000 辆汽车，这些汽车的零部件来自被禁的中国供应商
item.description: 美国参议院周一公布的一份报告称，德国汽车制造商宝马公司向美国进口了 8,000 辆 Mini Cooper 汽车，这些汽车的零部件来自一家被禁的中国供应商。【原文：German automaker BMW imported 8,000 Mini Cooper vehicles into the United States with components from a banned Chinese supplier, a U.S. Senate report released Monday said.】

item.title: 需求低迷导致全球石油市场疲软
item.description: 交易商和分析师告诉路透社，由于炼油需求疲软和供应充足，全球原油现货市场正在走弱，这可能意味着基准原油期货将进一步走软。【原文：Global physical crude oil markets are weakening because of soft refinery demand and ample supply, traders and analysts told Reuters, in a move that could spell further weakness for benchmark crude futures.】
